issues.title: Green New Deal
issues.description: Co-authored landmark climate change legislation with Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez, proposing comprehensive plan to address climate crisis through massive economic transformation

issues.title: Medicare for All
issues.description: Strong supporter of universal healthcare, advocating for comprehensive single-payer healthcare system to provide coverage for all Americans

issues.title: Student Debt Relief
issues.description: Supports comprehensive student loan forgiveness and making public colleges tuition-free

issues.title: Net Neutrality
issues.description: Fierce advocate for protecting open internet and preventing internet service providers from controlling online content access

issues.title: Immigration Reform
issues.description: Supports comprehensive immigration reform with pathway to citizenship for undocumented immigrants

issues.title: Climate Justice
issues.description: Advocates for equitable climate policy that addresses environmental racism and supports frontline communities

issues.title: LGBTQ+ Rights
issues.description: Long-time supporter of comprehensive LGBTQ+ non-discrimination protections and equality
